name: Runnordai
summary:
Enter the foreboding world of Runnordai, an eerie and unsettling game set within the confines of a sprawling hospital. As you navigate the labyrinthine corridors, your sole objective is to check every locker and uncover a crucial code needed to escape. But beware, a sinister figure lurks in the shadows, emerging at random intervals with distorted laughter and a chilling presence that clouds your vision.

Time is of the essence in this macabre chase. Lingering too long in a certain area spells doom, but swift evasion can keep you one step ahead. Equipped with a phone, you monitor ventilation issues, while managing the battery levels of both your phone and computer. The PC serves as your lifeline to rectify the escalating ventilation problems, its power restored through a strategically placed lever within the map.

Immerse yourself in the chilling atmosphere of Runnordai, where each step could be your last. Unlock the secrets within the hospital's walls, confront your pursuer, and strive to escape this haunting nightmare. Are you ready to embrace the darkness and face the unknown?
